Description: Grey sandstone trial-piece bearing Hieroglyphic text including a cartouche.
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM Part 5: Plate 26 PM II (2): p.424
Bibliographic references: Hall 1914 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 5. (pl.26)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1989 Jun-Sep, Swaffham Museum, Wonderful Things! The Howard Carter Exhibition 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
Acquisition name: Donated by: George Herbert, 5th Earl of Carnarvon
